Mary-Ann you are more hero thank you thank you thank you:)

I'm [devastated]...a Hokkaido arc w/ Nagakura Shinpachi...ofcourse he
would have to explain how Nagakura ended up there and why...we were
cheated out of a depiction of Hijikata and the remaining Shinsengumi
at Goryokaku.  It would've been an amazing arc because N.W. would have
to deal with Soujiro...

secretarytocapt3
(wiping away tears of sorrow)

P.S. Mary-Ann did you put your translation in the "files" section?
